data.text: This centrally located hotel can not be beat. You are steps away from all the sightseeing and transportation to take you all over the city. The front reception, Ivan went out of his way to make our accommodations the absolute very best.  The rooms were spotless and very comfortable beds.  I loved this hotel so much I'm planning on another vacation with girlfriends and will definitely be staying at this hotel again.
data.title: Highly reccomend! Best Location, friendliest staff,  excellent rooms.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Lynnlivesforfood,

Thank you for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you highly recommend our hotel. It's wonderful to know that you found our location unbeatable, our staff the friendliest, and our rooms excellent. We're delighted that Ivan at the front reception went above and beyond to ensure your accommodations were top-notch. We take pride in our spotless rooms and comfortable beds. We can't wait to welcome you and your girlfriends back for another fantastic vacation at our hotel!

Thank you and kind regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia

data.text:
This was the worst hotel experience that I have encountered. I understand the fabric of the building is ancient but  the sound proofing is appalling and unfortunately we had spectacularly noisy and inconsiderate guests in the next room. 3 nights of solid partying from 3am and a strong smell of dope elicited  no useful response from reception. “ Phone down and we will ask them to be quiet” which appeared to have no impact whatsoever
The last morning of our stay all the other guests on the “ principal floor” were at reception with identical concerns. Despite reassurances the “ guests “ would be asked to leave as this was a “family hotel “ they were firmly ensconced on our departure. No manager was available in the hotel to escalate concerns to. Don’t stay here and avoid H10 - they are swift to charge your credit card but trying to get a refund of any description is like crossing the rubicon …the hotel staff claim they don’t have authority to do anything apart from offer you an e mail address for accounts. 
If you are unlucky enough to have booked -don’t pay for breakfast. Hopeless coffee machine and the same plate of mouldy grapes appeared on 3 consecutive days….
data.title: Unbearable Noise Disturbance

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear saO2,

Thank you for sharing your experience, although we are truly sorry to hear about the disturbances you encountered during your stay. We take all feedback seriously and strive to provide a pleasant and peaceful environment for our guests.

However, it's important to clarify that your description of the situation does not align with our usual standards of service. We apologize if you felt that our response to the noise disturbances was inadequate. Our team is trained to address such issues promptly and effectively, and we regret any inconvenience caused by the noise from neighboring guests.

Regarding your concerns about breakfast, we sincerely apologize for any disappointment with the coffee machine and the quality of the fruit provided. This is not reflective of the standards we aim to uphold, and we will investigate these matters further to ensure improvements are made.

Regarding your comments about obtaining a refund, we strive to handle all guest requests with care and efficiency. We apologize if you encountered any difficulties in this process and assure you that we will review our procedures to prevent similar issues in the future.

We understand your frustrations and sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused during your stay. We value your feedback as it helps us to identify areas for improvement and to ensure that all guests have a positive experience. 

Once again, we apologize for the shortcomings you experienced and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, providing you with a more enjoyable stay.

Thank you and kind regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia

data.text: It’s a perfect location and the staff was very accommodating. We stayed in the family suit and it was good enough space for a family of 4 with two teens. We enjoyed the bathroom and the shower water pressure was perfect. It was a great stay and the perfect location.
data.title: Hotel stay.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear lornaramdayali,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay in our family suite and found it spacious enough for your family. It's great to know that you appreciated the bathroom and the perfect water pressure in the shower. We appreciate your kind words about our staff and the perfect location. We hope to welcome you and your family back for another great stay in the future!

Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia

data.text:
Hotel is centrally located in Barcelona
Perfect for all the buses and metro stations.
Over looking Placa de Catalyuna
Great location to explore from
Staff very helpful and friendly .
Helped us plan our visits to tourist attractions.
Highly recommend 
Good value for money
Our room over looking the square
Lots to watch.
data.title: Great location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear MM322,

Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your positive experience! We're thrilled you enjoyed our central location, overlooking Placa de Catalunya, and found it perfect for exploring Barcelona. It's great to hear that our staff was helpful and friendly, assisting you in planning your visits to tourist attractions. We appreciate your recommendation and are pleased that you found good value for money. We hope to welcome you back for more enjoyable stays in the future!

Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia

data.text: Very nice and charming hotel on a great location. The family suite is very good value for a 5 person family with plenty off space for all family members. The breakfast was excellent and had a lot off variety. The staff was very vriendly. I would certainly recommend it to other families.
data.title: Highly recommended for families

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 799frederickv,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your positive experience! We're thrilled to hear that you found our hotel nice and charming with a great location. It's wonderful that the family suite provided good value and ample space for your family. We appreciate your kind words about the excellent and varied breakfast, as well as the friendly staff. Your recommendation means a lot to us. We hope to welcome you and other families back in the future!

Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia
